comments.author: Sascha Theves
comments.body: I have already mailed this issue to the user mailing list and Jukka Zitting does know the problem. Is it possible to get a patch for the problem because it is very critical to us. When will be Jackrabbit 1.6.1 released? Maybe we can switch to that version.

comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body:
Fixed in revision 830575 and merged to the 1.6 branch in revision 830650.

There's not yet a fixed schedule for the 1.6.1 release, but I think we should do it soon as we already have quite a few fixes lined up for it.

description: If you use the RepositoryCopier to make a backup of your repository and you have open-scoped (not session scoped) locks, these locks will not be copied. If you try to restore your copy of the repository all locks are gone.
summary: RepositoryCopier does not copy open-scoped Locks
